SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM CAR_PARK WHERE 1=1
and CAR_PARK_NM LIKE '%' || #{searchTxt} || '%'
and CASE CAR_PARK_TP_NM WHEN 1 THEN '노상' ELSE '노외' END LIKE '%' || #{searchTxt} || '%'
and ADDRESS LIKE '%' || #{searchTxt} || '%'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM GAS_STATION WHERE 1=1

SELECT G.GAS_STATION_NUM, G.GAS_NM, G.ROAD_NM_ADDRESS, G.PHONE FROM(SELECT GAS_STATION_NUM, GAS_NM, ROAD_NM_ADDRESS, PHONE, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY GAS_STATION_NUM DESC) AS RNK FROM GAS_STATION WHERE 1 = 1 )G WHERE G.RNK BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT F.RESTAURANT_NO, F.ENT_NM, F.PHONE, F.ROAD_NM_ADDRESS FROM(SELECT RESTAURANT_NO, ENT_NM, PHONE, ROAD_NM_ADDRESS, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY RESTAURANT_NO DESC) AS RNK FROM RESTAURANT WHERE 1 = 1 ) F WHERE F.RNK BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM RESTAURANT WHERE 1=1

SELECT C.CINEMA_MAG_NUM, C.ENT_NM, C.ROAD_NM, C.PHONE FROM(SELECT CINEMA_MAG_NUM, ENT_NM, ROAD_NM, PHONE, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY CINEMA_MAG_NUM DESC) AS RNK FROM CINEMA WHERE 1 = 1 ) C WHERE C.RNK BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM CINEMA WHERE 1=1
